game.name: Nine Skies
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nine Skies is a myth-inspired roguelite bullet heaven. As an ancient deity, command auto-firing divine artifacts through the Nine Heavens. Survive hordes of mythical beasts in fast-paced, screen-filling combat where power meets elegance.
